patthana15.62:4.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:4.2: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:4.3: Upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalañca naupekkhāsahagataṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:5.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:5.2: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.62:5.3: Upekkhāsahagataṃ akusalañca naupekkhāsahagataṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
